requestParams.name: sku_id
requestParams.desc:
商品无sku的时候，这个值不填
商品有sku的时候，需要填写sku_id

requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['item_id']=440314986
params['offline_id']=50787601
params['price']="8"

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.multistore.goods.singlesku.update', '3.0.0', 'GET', params=params, files=files)

'440314986', 'offline_id' => '50787601', 'price' => '8', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
';
var_dump(
    $client->get($method, $api_version, $my_params, $my_files)
);
